Package soot.baf.toolkits.base

A toolkit to optimize the Baf IR.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Peephole
    Interface to be implemented by peepholes acting on the Baf IR.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExamplePeephole
    Example peephole that remove all checkcast operations.
    LoadStoreOptimizer  
    OpStackCalculator
    Emulates the operation of the JVM stack to compute the expected types of the objects on the stack at each Unit in a BafBody.
    PeepholeOptimizer
    Driver class to run peepholes on the Baf IR.
    StoreChainOptimizer
    Due to local packing, we may have chains of assignments to the same local.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    StackTypesValidator
    Checks if the locals and the operand stack will contain the correct types for each instruction in the BafBody.

Package soot.baf.toolkits.base Description

A toolkit to optimize the Baf IR. Includes a store/load optimizer for eliminating redundent store and load instructions, as well as peepholes and the infrastructure required to add new ones.
